Package layers.double_based

Class LayerD

  • java.lang.Object
    • layers.double_based.LayerD
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LayerInnerD, LayerInputD, LayerOutputD
    public abstract class LayerD
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class heavily outlines the functionality of a layer in a NeuralNetwork, using double as its basic calculation unit. The implementation is based on expressing the weights & biases as matrices instead of as instances of some 'Neuron' class.
    Author:
    OdinhengeT
    See Also:
    NeuralNetworkD, LayerInnerD, LayerInputD, LayerOutputD, MatrixOperations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayerD​(int nbrNeurons, int nbrLinks)
      Constructs a LayerD with nbrNeurons neurons and nbrLinks links (the next layer in the network has nbrLinks neurons).

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayerD

        public LayerD​(int nbrNeurons,
              int nbrLinks)
        Constructs a LayerD with nbrNeurons neurons and nbrLinks links (the next layer in the network has nbrLinks neurons). Initiates all the weights and biases with random values (following a gaussian distribution with mean 0 and standard deviation 1). these random values are then devided by the square root of the number of neurons in the layer.
        Parameters:
        nbrNeurons - number of neurons
        nbrLinks - number of links

    • Method Detail

      • input

        public void input​(double[] input)
        Gives the layer a new input.
        Parameters:
        input - the vectorized input assigned to the layer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is of incorrect length

        public double getInputTo​(int neuron)
        Returns the input given to the neuron at neuron.
        Parameters:
        neuron - the index of the neuron of interest
        Returns:
        last assigned input to said neuron

      • getWeightAt

        public double getWeightAt​(int link,
                          int neuron)
        Returns the weight that connects the neuron at index neuron in this layer with the neuron at index link in the next layer.
        Parameters:
        link - index of neuron in next layer
        neuron - index of neuron in this layer
        Returns:
        weight from neuron to link

      • getActivation

        public double[][] getActivation()

        Returns:
        activation of each neuron in layer

        public void updateWeights​(double[][] deltaWeights)

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if deltaWeights not of same dimension as this.weights
